Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for considering St Andrews Cathedral School for your child’s education and development. As requested, you have been booked into the {!Lead.School_Tour_Date__c} and we will email one week prior to remind you and provide further details.
In the meantime, if there's anything else we can help you with, please do not hesitate to contact us.
To keep up to date with what’s happening across our K-12 St Andrew’s community, visit our facebookpage. It’s updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and mini videos.<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Yours Sincerely,
Robyn Pedley Enrolment Assistant
